Name: Blood of Brigands
Phase12Description: Bandit blood has been spilt outside of Cerrigar. I should return to Bryce in town for my payment.
Phase6Description:
A man in Cerrigar claims the roads have become even more dangerous following Astaroth's attack.

He has hired me to strike fear into bandits throughout the Emerald Chase in hopes that he may travel again soon.
Toast: The glenfolk will pay anyone willing to keep the roads safe.
